content: {"name": "Project PLASE, Monthly Food Giveaway", "alternate_name": "", "description": "COVID-19 Update 5/23/23: Accepts walk-ins for intake. Meal times: breakfast 7:30AM-8:30AM; Lunch 12Noon-1PM; Dinner 5PM-6PM. Showers, laundry services, case managment, and mail services are available. DROP-IN CENTER: Provides a daytime drop-in center for women and women with children. Serves breakfast (7:30-8:30AM), lunch (12Noon-1PM) and dinner (5-6PM). NA meetings are held Tues and Thurs, 10AM. Offers access to showers, baths and toiletries, use of telephone and mailing address, able to wash 1 load of laundry per week. Offers limited storage during the day time only, items cannot be left overnight. On site case management, behavioral health, and life skills training. Makes referrals to other services including psychiatry, medical care, case management, life skills, resume building, job training and night shelter. Also accepts donations of non-perishable food, clothing, personal items, and cleaning products. Serves as a Warming Center when Code Blue is declared by the City.", "email": "", "url": "https://projectplase.org/need-housing/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3601 Old Frederick Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21229", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.29461, "longitude": -76.62349}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 415-6913", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Showers and laundry. First come first serve basis Mon-Thurs 9am"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
